info.title: Platformatic DB
info.description: Exposing a SQL database as REST

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit will be applied by default if not passed. If the provided value exceeds the maximum allowed value a validation error will be thrown

post.description: Add new report to the database.

put.description: Update one or more reports in the database.

get.description: Fetch Report using its id from the database.

delete.description: Delete one or more reports from the Database.

post.description: Add new rule to the database.

put.description: Update one or more rules in the database.

get.description: Fetch Rule using its id from the database.

delete.description: Delete one or more rules from the Database.

get.description: Fetch all the ruleConfigs for rule from the database.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit will be applied by default if not passed. If the provided value exceeds the maximum allowed value a validation error will be thrown

post.description: Add new ruleConfig to the database.

put.description: Update one or more ruleConfigs in the database.

get.description: Fetch RuleConfig using its id from the database.

delete.description: Delete one or more ruleConfigs from the Database.

get.description: Fetch the rule for ruleConfig from the database.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit will be applied by default if not passed. If the provided value exceeds the maximum allowed value a validation error will be thrown

put.description: Update one or more metadata in the database.

get.description: Fetch Metadatum using its id from the database.

delete.description: Delete one or more metadata from the Database.
